scripts.test:debug: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/step_definitions --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features --tags @debug --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}"
scripts.test:pipeline: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions --format node_modules/@cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features
scripts.test:chrome: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @bug --require src/step_definitions --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}"
scripts.test:firefox: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"firefox\"}"
scripts.test:edge: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --env edge  src/features
scripts.test:sandbox.chrome: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @bug --require src/step_definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features  --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"sandbox.chrome\"}"
scripts.test:parallel: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/step_definitions --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json src/features --tags @debug --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}" --parallel 4 & npm run report
